category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: In this category, also the short-term accommodation (airbnb type) is included, only in the case where the lessor is (a) a legal entity or (b) natural person, who shall supply at least 3 immovable properties (e.g. house, flat, rooms in a flat etc) in order to be included. In ALL other cases of short-term accommodation (i.e. NATURAL persons that supply 1 or 2 immovable properties) this service is VAT exempted.

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate (RR) applies to restaurant and catering services, excluding night clubs. Moreover, the RR applies to the delivery or take-away of non-alcoholic beverages (nAB) from companies that are dealing with restaurant and catering services. The standard rate still applies to alcoholic beverages IN ANY CASE (i.e. serving, delivery or take away) and ONLY in the serving of nAB

category.description: Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes, including products used for contraception and sanitary protection

vatRateResults.comment: Restricted to medicines in the meaning of The Medicines Act. Including herbal medicinal products and homeopathic preparations in so far they, according to the registration due to The Med. Act may be sold only at pharmacies. Also including clinical foodstuffs as well as basic creams and ointments in so far they are eligible for reimbursement in accordance with the The Health Insurance Act. Female sanitary protection and incontinence articles and napkins for babies taxed with the reduced rate.

vatRateResults.comment: Restricted to medicines in the meaning of The Medicines Act. Including herbal medicinal products and homeopathic preparations in so far they, according to the registration due to The Med. Act may be sold only at pharmacies. Also including clinical foodstuffs as well as basic creams and ointments in so far they are eligible for reimbursement in accordance with the The Health Insurance Act. Female sanitary protection and incontinence articles and napkins for babies taxed with the reduced rate.

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment: The Zero Rate of VAT applies to the supply of foodstuffs like bread, butter, cheese, cereals, condiments, flour, fruit, herbs, meat, milk, pasta, pastes, sauces, soups, spices, sugar and vegetables, (fresh or frozen). This is not an exhaustive list, but an indicative one. When supplied in the course of catering or from a vending machine, these foods become liable to the reduced rate. Certain other foods are Standard Rated.

vatRateResults.comment: The supply of bakery products, such as cakes, certain biscuits, bagels and croissants, (being flour or egg based) is liable to VAT at the reduced rate  . This applies when the products are served with meals or supplied as a cold take-away. The supply of bread that meets the ingredient definition in Irish VAT legislation is liable to the zero rate. Food Supplement Products are also subject to the reduced rate.

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support or supplied electronically or both (including brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, children's picture, drawing or colouring books, music printed or in manuscript form, maps and hydrographic or similar charts), other than publications wholly or predominantly devoted to advertising and other than publications wholly or predominantly consisting of video content or audible music.

vatRateResults.comment: The Zero Rate applies to newspapers, printed books, e-books, audiobooks, atlases, annual publications, children’s picture, colouring and music books. For a printed booklet to qualify for the zero rating, it must consist of essentially pictorial or textual matter, must have a distinctive front cover devoid of body text, must be no less than eight pages (excluding the cover) and must be bound, stitched or stapled.

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment: Comments Certain Medical equipment, aids and their parts are at the 0% VAT rate. This includes, invalid carriages, orthopaedic appliances, surgical belts, artificial limbs, artificial parts of the body,  and deaf aids, walking frames, crutches, and parts of same. This does not include artificial teeth, corrective spectacles, or contact lenses. For specific queries, more detail can be found on the Revenue Commissioner's VAT Rates Database - https://www.revenue.ie/en/vat/vat-rates/index.aspx

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. a.34 and b.1: carriages and crutches for the disabled; stand-up chairs; high-low beds. A vehicle for the disabled is defined as a means of transport that is designed to be used by a disabled person. The term can also include motor vehicles which are equipped for use by a disabled person. 

Only carriages that within social standards are regarded as a vehicle for the invalid on the basis of its destination and presentation are included.

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. a.34 and b.1: carriages and crutches for the disabled; stand-up chairs; high-low beds. A vehicle for the disabled is defined as a means of transport that is designed to be used by a disabled person. The term can also include motor vehicles which are equipped for use by a disabled person. 

Only carriages that within social standards are regarded as a vehicle for the invalid on the basis of its destination and presentation are included.

Tabel I prov. a.36 and b.1: aids that are usually used for the subcutaneous administration of insulin, with the exception of syringes and needles that are apparently also suitable for other purposes; aids that are usually used for the self-diagnosis of blood sugar levels. 

Only included are the mentioned devices specifically developed for diabetics and offered as such. Generally applicable aids such as individual injection needles and syringes are excluded.

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. b.19: the application of energy-saving materials to floors, walls and roofs of housing in use for more than 2 years, when this service is aimed at making housing more energy-efficient. 
Structural components such as windows and doors are a normal part of housing and as such are not insulating material. 
Excluded: the supplies of materials which account for part of the value of the included services.

category.description: The renovation and repair of private dwellings, excluding materials which account for a significant part of the value of the service supplied

vatRateResults.comment:

Painting: processing and application of paint or painting system (whole of activities associated with the pre-treatment of a specific surface and subsequent finishing of that surface with specific paint products.)

Plastering: preparation and pre-treatment work a plasterer performs before proceeding to actual plastering;  plastering.

Tabel I, prov. a.29: works of art, collectors' items and antiques, insofar as these are imported; or insofar these are supplied by: the maker or his successor in title under universal title; or an entrepreneur, other than a reseller, who fully deducts the tax on his  acquisition
Works of art, objects for collections and antiques are defined in Article 2a, first paragraph, under m, of the Act in connection with Article 4, second paragraph, of the implementing order and the annex J to that order.

code.description: Holiday and other short stay accommodation services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.11: providing accommodation within a hotel, guesthouse and holiday business to persons who stay for only a short period. The terms 'hotel, guesthouse and holiday business' must be interpreted according to parlance. Whether the stay is considered short-term depends on the nature and duration of the stay. Stays for a maximum of six months, during which the guests do not relocate the center of their social life to the accommodation are included; longer stays usually are not.

code.description: Camping ground, recreational and vacation camp services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.10: providing the opportunity to camp within the context of a camping and holiday business to persons who only stay there for a short period. The term "camp and holiday business" should be interpreted according to parlance. It is not required that the lessor provides the additional services that camping sites normally provide. 'providing the opportunity to camp' must also be interpreted according to parlance.

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.12: serving out foodstuffs for human consumption, for use on site within the context of a hotel, café, restaurant, guesthouse and related businesses. The supply of freshly prepared food or edible products for immediate consumption in snack bars, snack vans, cinema foyers, sports club canteens and such is considered a supply of goods, unless the services accompanying the delivery of the foodstuffs predominate.

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.14 to b.15: granting (physical) access to circusses; zoos; public museums or collections (including closely related supplies of goods, such as catalogs, photographs); music and stage performances, including lectures (excluding peep shows/other performances primarily aimed at erotic entertainment); cinemas; amusement parks, playgrounds and gardens, other facilities primarily and permanently furnished to entertainment and day recreation.

category.description: Window cleaning and cleaning in private households

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.20: regular cleaning services regarding the interior of private households (including closed corridors) are included. Excluded: cleaning services regarding the exterior of private households, cleaning services regarding other buildings than private households and cleaning services that are not considered regular cleaning services regularly performed by a cleaner (such as special services performed with special equipment, e.g. cleaning of chimney, central heating).

code.description: Other sports and recreational sports services

category.description: Admission to sporting events

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.3 and b.14, f: the granting of (physical) access to spectators of sports competitions, demonstrations and the like. Sports competitions are events where people actively participate in sports. Sports demonstrations are, for example, shows of the Harlem Globetrotters (basketball), performances of the Spanish Riding School (horse dressage) and shows of Wrestlemania (wrestling); use of sporting facilities.

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.17: performances by performing artists. This includes performances by artists in music and stage performances as meant in the foregoing item. The reduced VAT rate only applies to performances that can be (in)directly heard or viewed by an audience. Rehearsals associated with and necessary for those performances are included. Excluded: providing the opportunity to participate in a performance and organizing performances.

category.description: Minor repairs of shoes and leather goods

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.5: Footwear: all kinds of footwear such as (sports) shoes, sandals, ski boots. Skates, inline skates and such can be regarded as footwear for the shoe part. Which material the footwear is made of is irrelevant. 'Leather goods' include small articles made from leather (leather suitcases and bags, gloves, wallets and belts, etc). Repair of large leather utensils (such as furniture); grinding and straightening skates and supplies of goods sold separately (laces etc.)are excluded.

category.description: Minor repairs of clothing and household linen (including mending and alteration)

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. b.6 Household linen: all textile items used in a household (curtains, cloths, and (beach) towels, etc.). Rugs and the upholstery of sofas and chairs are not considered household linen. 
Both repairing and altering are included (sealing holes and tears and replacing buttons, zippers, lengthening/shortening and tightenig/loosening etc.). Excluded are, a.o.: washing, dry cleaning, steaming, pressing, embroidery/appliqué, and  production of clothing/household linen on commission.

code.description: Hairdressing services for women and girls
Hairdressing and barbers' services for men and boys

category.description: Hairdressing

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.7: activities a hairdresser usually performs on human hair (cutting, washing, blow drying, dyeing, shaving etc). Products that hairdressers use when treating hair ( shampoo, hair dye, etc.) and inexpensive hair ornaments incorporated into a hairstyle that are not separately charged and application of hair extensions and measurement and overhaul of wigs and toupees are also included. The material used for those services (hair extension, wig or toupee) is excluded.

Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material
Children's picture, drawing or colouring books
Music, printed or in manuscript, whether or not bound or illustrated
Calendars of any kind, printed, including calendar blocks

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support or supplied electronically or both (including brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, children's picture, drawing or colouring books, music printed or in manuscript form, maps and hydrographic or similar charts), other than publications wholly or predominantly devoted to advertising and other than publications wholly or predominantly consisting of video content or audible music.

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. a.30, b.2, b.21: digital or physical supplies (including on loan of): books; digital educational information that is provided on physical carriers and that is apparently intended exclusively or almost exclusively for the transfer of information in education; newspapers, weeklies, magazines and other publications appearing periodically at least three times a year.

code.description: Tubular metal needles and needles for sutures
Repair and installation services of machinery and equipment
Repair services of computers and personal and household goods

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. a.36 and b.1: aids that are usually used for the subcutaneous administration of insulin, with the exception of syringes and needles that are apparently also suitable for other purposes; aids that are usually used for the self-diagnosis of blood sugar levels. 

Only included are the mentioned devices specifically developed for diabetics and offered as such. Generally applicable aids such as individual injection needles and syringes are excluded.

category.description: The renovation and repair of private dwellings, excluding materials which account for a significant part of the value of the service supplied

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. b.19: the application of energy-saving materials to floors, walls and roofs of housing in use for more than 2 years, when this service is aimed at making housing more energy-efficient. 
Structural components such as windows and doors are a normal part of housing and as such are not insulating material. 
Excluded: the supplies of materials which account for part of the value of the included services.

category.description: The renovation and repair of private dwellings, excluding materials which account for a significant part of the value of the service supplied

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I prov. b.8: Painting and plastering of private dwellings (i.m. intended for permanent residence by individuals) more than two years after first use. 

Painting: processing and application of paint or painting system (whole of activities associated with the pre-treatment of a specific surface and subsequent finishing of that surface with specific paint products.)

Plastering: preparation and pre-treatment work a plasterer performs before proceeding to actual plastering;  plastering.

code.description: Sea and coastal passenger water transport services

category.description: Transport of passengers and their accompanying luggage

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.9: private bus transport; public transport and taxi transport as referred to in Article 1 of the 'Wet personenvervoer 2000 (Dutch 'Passenger Transport Act 2000'), taxi transport of persons by road other than by car, and the transport of persons by aircraft if the place of departure and the place of destination are located in the Netherlands insofar as this transport takes place by balloons or by aircraft equipped for the transport of ill or injured persons;

code.description: Holiday and other short stay accommodation services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.11: providing accommodation within a hotel, guesthouse and holiday business to persons who stay for only a short period. The terms 'hotel, guesthouse and holiday business' must be interpreted according to parlance. Whether the stay is considered short-term depends on the nature and duration of the stay. Stays for a maximum of six months, during which the guests do not relocate the center of their social life to the accommodation are included; longer stays usually are not.

code.description: Camping ground, recreational and vacation camp services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.10: providing the opportunity to camp within the context of a camping and holiday business to persons who only stay there for a short period. The term "camp and holiday business" should be interpreted according to parlance. It is not required that the lessor provides the additional services that camping sites normally provide. 'providing the opportunity to camp' must also be interpreted according to parlance.

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.12: serving out foodstuffs for human consumption, for use on site within the context of a hotel, café, restaurant, guesthouse and related businesses. The supply of freshly prepared food or edible products for immediate consumption in snack bars, snack vans, cinema foyers, sports club canteens and such is considered a supply of goods, unless the services accompanying the delivery of the foodstuffs predominate.

code.description: Reservation services for event tickets, entertainment and recreational services and other reservation services n.e.c.
Operation services of historical sites and buildings and similar visitor attractions
Botanical and zoological garden services and nature reserve services

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.14 to b.15: granting (physical) access to circusses; zoos; public museums or collections (including closely related supplies of goods, such as catalogs, photographs); music and stage performances, including lectures (excluding peep shows/other performances primarily aimed at erotic entertainment); cinemas; amusement parks, playgrounds and gardens, other facilities primarily and permanently furnished to entertainment and day recreation.

category.description: Window cleaning and cleaning in private households

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.20: regular cleaning services regarding the interior of private households (including closed corridors) are included. Excluded: cleaning services regarding the exterior of private households, cleaning services regarding other buildings than private households and cleaning services that are not considered regular cleaning services regularly performed by a cleaner (such as special services performed with special equipment, e.g. cleaning of chimney, central heating).

code.description: Other sports and recreational sports services

category.description: Admission to sporting events

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.3 and b.14, f: the granting of (physical) access to spectators of sports competitions, demonstrations and the like. Sports competitions are events where people actively participate in sports. Sports demonstrations are, for example, shows of the Harlem Globetrotters (basketball), performances of the Spanish Riding School (horse dressage) and shows of Wrestlemania (wrestling); use of sporting facilities.

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.17: performances by performing artists. This includes performances by artists in music and stage performances as meant in the foregoing item. The reduced VAT rate only applies to performances that can be (in)directly heard or viewed by an audience. Rehearsals associated with and necessary for those performances are included. Excluded: providing the opportunity to participate in a performance and organizing performances.

code.description: Repair services of footwear and leather goods

category.description: Minor repairs of shoes and leather goods

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel I prov. b.5: Footwear: all kinds of footwear such as (sports) shoes, sandals, ski boots. Skates, inline skates and such can be regarded as footwear for the shoe part. Which material the footwear is made of is irrelevant. 'Leather goods' include small articles made from leather (leather suitcases and bags, gloves, wallets and belts, etc). Repair of large leather utensils (such as furniture); grinding and straightening skates and supplies of goods sold separately (laces etc.)are excluded.

code.description: Repair and alteration services of garment and household textile articles

category.description: Minor repairs of clothing and household linen (including mending and alteration)

Tabel I prov. b.6 Household linen: all textile items used in a household (curtains, cloths, and (beach) towels, etc.). Rugs and the upholstery of sofas and chairs are not considered household linen. 
Both repairing and altering are included (sealing holes and tears and replacing buttons, zippers, lengthening/shortening and tightenig/loosening etc.). Excluded are, a.o.: washing, dry cleaning, steaming, pressing, embroidery/appliqué, and  production of clothing/household linen on commission.

category.description: Supply and installation of solar panels on and adjacent to private dwellings, housing and public and other buildings used for activities in the public interest

vatRateResults.comment: Tabel II prov. a.10: A zero rate is applicable for the supply and installation of solar panels [panels that have the function of generating electricity from sunlight with photovoltaic cells (also known as PV cells or solar cells)] on and adjacent to private dwellings. An important condition for the 0% rate is that the panels are installed on or near a home.

vatRateResults.comment:
Tabel I, prov. a.29: works of art, collectors' items and antiques, insofar as these are imported; or insofar these are supplied by: the maker or his successor in title under universal title; or an entrepreneur, other than a reseller, who fully deducts the tax on his  acquisition
Works of art, objects for collections and antiques are defined in Article 2a, first paragraph, under m, of the Act in connection with Article 4, second paragraph, of the implementing order and the annex J to that order.

category.description: Supply of water

vatRateResults.comment:

Excluded: demineralized, deironed and softened water; river water and sea water (2501 00 10) whether or not intended for scientific purposes; ice and steam.

Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes, including products used for contraception and sanitary protection

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CN codes to those products. Pursuant to Article 41(2),146ef(1)(2) item 14 of Annex 3 to Act of 11 March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax reduced rate is applied to pharmaceutical products admitted to trading in the territory of Poland in accordance with the provisions of Act of 6 September 2001-Pharmaceutical Law and those that have obtained a permit issued by the Council of the EU or the European Commission (regardless of CN).

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CN codes with respect to those items. Pursuant to Article 41(2), 146ef(1)(2), item 13 of Annex 3 to Act of 11 March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax reduced rate is applied to medical devices, accessories for medical devices, systems and procedure packs within the meaning of the Regulation (EU)2017/745 of The European Parliament and of the Council of 5 April2017 on medical devices,  admitted to trading in the territory of Poland

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CPA codes with respect to those services. Pursuant to Article 41(2), 146ef(1)(2), item 64, 65, 66, 68 of Annex 3 to Act of 11 March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax reduced rate is applied to admission to (regardless of CPA codes): artistic performances,including circus performances, cultural facilities;amusement parks,theme parks, discos, dance halls; libraries, archives, museums and other cultural services; other services related to leisure.

category.description: Reception of radio and television broadcasting services

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CPA codes to those services. Pursuant to Article 41(2), 146ef(1)(2),item 48 of Annex 3 to Act of 11March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax, the 8% rate is applied to services, other than electronic services (regardless of CPA codes), consisting in enabling reception of TV and radio programmes, within the meaning of Radio and TV Broadcasting regulations,by means of reception facilities,excluding rental of films and programmes at a time chosen by the recipient.

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CPA codes with respect to those services. Pursuant to Article 41(2), 146ef(1)(2) item 63 of Annex 3 to Act of 11 March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax reduced rate is applied to services of authors and performers within the meaning of the Act of 4 February 1994 on copyright and related rights remunerated in the form of fees for the transfer or licensing of copyrights or rights to artistic performance (regardless of CPA codes).

category.description: Provision, construction, renovation and alteration of housing, as part of a social policy

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CPA codes to those services. The 8% rate is applied to services regarding building structures or parts thereof included in house-construction covered by a social housing programme within the meaning of and in line with the rules laid down in Article 41, paragraphs 12-12e of Act of 11 March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax.

category.description: The renovation and repair of private dwellings, excluding materials which account for a significant part of the value of the service supplied

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CPA codes to those services. The 8% rate is applied to services regarding building structures or parts thereof included in house-construction covered by a social housing programme within the meaning of and in line with the rules laid down in Article 41, paragraphs 12-12e of Act of 11 March 2004 on Goods and Services Tax.

category.description: Admission to sporting events

vatRateResults.comment: The Polish VAT rules do not provide for CPA codes with respect to those services. When those goods are imported from a third territory or a third country, the application of the reduced rate is conditioned by the submission of the Commitment Declaration regarding the destination of the goods. Point 37 para.(5)-(9) of Norms.

vatRateResults.comment: The construction, rehabilitation, modernization services of hospital units, provided to non-profit entities registered in the Public Register organized by A.N.A.F., if the services purchased by non-profit entities are made available free of charge to hospital units in the public state network or are intended for hospital units owned and operated by non-profit entities. Art. 294 para. (5) letter (a) and art. 294 para. (6) of the Fiscal Code.

code.description: Construction works for non-residential buildings (new works, additions, alterations and renovation works)

category.description: The renovation and repair of private dwellings, excluding materials which account for a significant part of the value of the service supplied

vatRateResults.comment: The construction, rehabilitation, modernization services of hospitals, provided to companies wholly owned by non-profit entities registered in the Public Register organized by A.N.A.F., if the services are available free of charge to public hospitals or are intended for hospitals owned and operated by these companies, under the cumulative conditions laid down in art. 294 para. (5) letter (a^1) of the Fiscal Code. See also art. 294 para. (6) and (6^1) of the Fiscal Code.

category.description: Wood used as firewood (until 1 January 2030)

vatRateResults.comment: Supply of firewood in the form of logs, in billets, in twigs, in faggots or in similar forms, and sawdust and wood waste and scrap, agglomerated in logs, briquettes, pellets or similar forms. See art. 291 para. (3) letters m), n) of the Fiscal Code.

code.description: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, whether or not in single sheets
Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material
Children's picture, drawing or colouring books
Music, printed or in manuscript, whether or not bound or illustrated

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support or supplied electronically or both (including brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, children's picture, drawing or colouring books, music printed or in manuscript form, maps and hydrographic or similar charts), other than publications wholly or predominantly devoted to advertising and other than publications wholly or predominantly consisting of video content or audible music.

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced VAT rate is applied for the supply of school textbooks, books, newspapers and magazines, either on physical means of support and/or supplied electronically, except for those which have, wholly or predominantly, video or music audio content and those intended exclusively or mainly for advertising. See art. 291 para. (3) letter a) of the Fiscal Code corroborated with point 38 para. (1) of the Methodological Norms.

category.description: Wood used as firewood (until 1 January 2030)

vatRateResults.comment: Supply of firewood in the form of logs, in billets, in twigs, in faggots or in similar forms, and sawdust and wood waste and scrap, agglomerated in logs, briquettes, pellets or similar forms. See art. 291 para. (3) letters m), n) of the Fiscal Code.

code.description: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, whether or not in single sheets
Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material
Children's picture, drawing or colouring books
Music, printed or in manuscript, whether or not bound or illustrated

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support or supplied electronically or both (including brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, children's picture, drawing or colouring books, music printed or in manuscript form, maps and hydrographic or similar charts), other than publications wholly or predominantly devoted to advertising and other than publications wholly or predominantly consisting of video content or audible music.

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced VAT rate is applied for the supply of school textbooks, books, newspapers and magazines, either on physical means of support and/or supplied electronically, except for those which have, wholly or predominantly, video or music audio content and those intended exclusively or mainly for advertising. See art. 291 para. (3) letter a) of the Fiscal Code corroborated with point 38 para. (1) of the Methodological Norms.

category.description: Wood used as firewood (until 1 January 2030)

vatRateResults.comment: The supply for the use as heating fuel of sawdust, waste and non-agglomerated wood scraps, carried out to final beneficiaries, on the basis of a statement of liability made available to the supplier. See art. 291 para. (3) letters m), n) of the Fiscal Code.

code.description: Operation services of historical sites and buildings and similar visitor attractions

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced VAT rate is applied for the services consisting in allowing access to castles, museums, memorial houses, historical monuments, architectural and archaeological monuments, zoological and botanical gardens. See art. 291 para. (3) letter b) of the Fiscal Code.

category.description: Wood used as firewood (until 1 January 2030)

vatRateResults.comment: The supply for the use as heating fuel of sawdust, waste and non-agglomerated wood scraps, carried out to final beneficiaries, on the basis of a statement of liability made available to the supplier. See art. 291 para. (3) letters m), n) of the Fiscal Code.

code.description: Operation services of historical sites and buildings and similar visitor attractions

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced VAT rate is applied for the services consisting in allowing access to castles, museums, memorial houses, historical monuments, architectural and archaeological monuments, zoological and botanical gardens. See art. 291 para. (3) letter b) of the Fiscal Code.

code.description: Photovoltaic cells not assembled in modules or made up into panels
Photovoltaic cells assembled in modules or made up into panels
Installation services of other general-purpose machinery n.e.c.
Heating, ventilation and air conditioning installation works

category.description: Supply of electricity, district heating and district cooling, and biogas produced by the feedstock listed in Annex IX, Part A, to Directive (EU) 2018/2001 of the European Parliament and of the Council; supply and installation of highly efficient low emissions heating systems meeting the emission (PM) benchmarks laid down in Annex V to Commission Regulation (EU) 2015/1189 and in Annex V to Commission Regulation (EU) 2015/1185 and having been attributed an EU energy label to show that the criterion referred to in Article 7(2) of Regulation (EU) 2017/1369 of the European Parliament and of the Council is met; and, until 1 January 2030, natural gas and wood used as firewood

vatRateResults.comment: Supply and installation of highly efficient low emissions heating systems including installation kits and all necessary components purchased separately, intended for housing, central or local government buildings, buildings of entities under their coordination/subordination, with the exception of companies. See Art. 291 para. (2), letters n), o), p) and q) of the Fiscal Code.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: Fertilization; Ploughing; Harrowing; Preparing the seedbed with combine and moulding soil; Seed sowing or planting; Land rolling; Spraying, dusting - fight diseases and pests, herbicide; Harvesting or crop dislocation; Collecting and baling the vegetal material, by pressing in bales; Hoeing crops; Executing or opening drains in order to shape the soil for vegetables – art. 291 para. (2) lett. h) of the Fiscal Code and points 1 - 7, 9, 10, 12, 13 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Pots planting for potatoes and vegetables; Mowing; Raking; Forage silage and fodder storage works in livestock farms; Meadow overseeding; Planting horticultural grape vines, trees; Deforestation of vineyards and orchards; Installation of support, growing and palisade system for vineyards and orchards. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and points 15, 18 - 20, 28, 35 - 37 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Specific works for manure discharge and providing the feed in or from animal breeding farms; Disinfection, plague and pest control in livestock farms; Sheep shearing; Eggs sorting, marking and packing; Cleaning animal hooves. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and points 29 - 33 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Artificial insemination in animals. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 43 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Collecting and baling the vegetal material, by pressing in bales (post-harvest services); Chopping the vegetable scraps; Topping sugar beet; Lining, baling, tying tobacco; Collecting, sorting, conditioning, labelling of vegetables and fruits works. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and points 10, 11, 16, 17, 25 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Treatment of seeds used in setting up of the agricultural crops, with plant protection products. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 8 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Multiplication of seeds. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 44 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Chopping wood cords, branches. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 24 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

code.description: Treatment and distribution services of water through mains
Trade services of water through mains

category.description: Supply of water

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced VAT rate is applied for the supply of water for irrigation in agriculture and for water supply and sewerage services. See art. 291 para. (2) letters g) and i) of the Fiscal Code and point 37 para. (13) of the Methodological Norms.

code.description: Irrigation systems (canals); water main and line constructions; water treatment plants, sewage disposal plants and pumping stations

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Installation of irrigation/fertigation system in vineyards and orchards, as well as in vegetable growing. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 38 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

code.description: Construction works for irrigation systems (canals), water mains and lines, water treatment plants, sewage disposal plants and pumping stations

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Clearing or cleaning irrigation and/or drainage channels. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 34 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

code.description: Construction works for coastal and port constructions, dams, locks and related hydro-mechanical structures

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Services to combat soil erosion such as coastal and port construction works, dams, locks and other hydromechanical structures (for the case of water erosion); Flood defense services. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and point 42 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022, respectively in Order no. 157/2011.

code.description: Soil and land preparation works; clearance works

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Levelling the agricultural land, which ensures a flat surface of the crop land, by reducing the micro-relief deviations caused by the other agricultural works; Soil scarification or deep loosening on compacted soils; Unclogging the soil at great depths, in order to favor the roots growth; Digging holes for planting trees and vines. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and points 14, 21 - 23 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

code.description: Soil and land preparation works; clearance works

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Cleaning of unwanted vegetation and destruction of heaps on pastures and hayfields; Arrangement of water sources for the animals on meadows, parcelling of meadows; Draining services. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and points 27, 28, 42 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022. Draining services are provided in point 42 of Order no. 4634/2012, respectively in Order no. 157/2011.

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate shall be applied for Operations for installing protected spaces, respectively greenhouses and/or solariums; Installation of hail and rain protection systems in vineyards and orchards. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter h) of the Fiscal Code and points 26 and 39 of the Annex to the Order no. 4634/2022.

code.description: Room or unit accommodation services for visitors, with daily housekeeping (except time-share)
Room or unit accommodation services for visitors in youth hostels and holiday cabins
Room or unit accommodation services for visitors in time-share properties
Other room or unit accommodation services for visitors, without daily housekeeping

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced VAT rate is applied for accommodation in the hotel sector or sectors with similar function, including renting of camping sites. For details see art. 291 para. (2) letter j) of the Fiscal Code corroborated with point 37 para. (14) of the Methodological Norms.

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, concerts, operas, ballets and similar performances are subject to 6 % VAT. The reduced rate also applies to admission to zoos. However, arrangement of public exhibitions in museums and supplies of items to such exhibitions are exempt if the museum is run by the public sector or is supported by the public sector. category.description: Provision, construction, renovation and alteration of housing, as part of a social policy

vatRateResults.comment: Construction of state-supported rental housing within the framework of the state's social policy (includes: delivery of a building or part of a building, including the construction land on which the building or part of the building stands, renovation and reconstruction of the building or part of the building, including construction and assembly work on the building).

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Accommodation and similar establishments as defined by NACE 55 code. The specific legal definition can be found in Annex 7a of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax. The change has been effective as of 1 January 2019. Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7a of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/
